content:
Hello, has anyone working in the claims domain done any work to map to concepts exposed by Pokitdot to the FHIR domain models?

E.g. https://platform.pokitdok.com/documentation/v4/#claims for claims, https://platform.pokitdok.com/documentation/v4/#eligibility for some of the coverage concepts.

• PokitDok :)
    I'm working on some of the Eligibility stuff at the moment - I think there are still some kinks to work out with the FHIR spec though. Talking about it over in the Implementers - Health Insurance thread
